name: Weapon Masters - Season 1
description:
Weapon Masters -  Season 1

Genre: 2D top-down shooter.

Game content:

  • 5 levels: easy to impossible + practice room
  • 3 game modes: Invasion, Payload, Boss Fight
  • 3 characters: Gunslinger, Mage, Assassin, each with 1 passive and 3 active abilities.
